job_details.degree_required: Masters Degree in Management Information Systems or equivalent

jd: From: Anoop, Sspearhead Inc. anoop@sspearhead.com Reply to: anoop@sspearhead.com Job Details:ERP Project Manager- Day 1 onsiteAlbany, NYLong Term Mandatory Qualification Project Manager Plans, organizes and integrates cross-functional information technology projects that are significant in scope and impact. Expert 84+ months: Candidate is able to provide guidance to large teams and/or has extensive industry experience and is considered at the top of his/her field. Qualification Number Requested Qualifications:1. 84 Months experience as a project manager with increasing responsibility. Experience must include management of all aspects of system implementation and integration within a large organizational structure, approximately 300 users.2. 84 months of management of timelines, tasks, and reporting.3. 84 months experience in the management of multiple simultaneous projects with competing deadlines.4. 84 months experience with managing defect resolution and being the liaison between the end users and development staff.5. 60 months experience with financial systems and processes, including operations and implementation.6. 60 months experience with the implementation and operation of Oracle/Peoplesoft Financials utilized in a large government environment, approximately 300 users.7. Masters Degree in Management Information Systems or equivalent. Proof of Education is to be submitted with all responses. Thanks,AnoopSspearhead Inc.www.Sspearhead.com
